Introduction
============

``radiobee`` (``radiobee aligner``) is a powerful dualtext aligner.

The aim here was

The current implementation has been developed in Python 3 and `gradio`.

Motivation
**********



Limitations
***********

Currently, only zh-en/en-zh pairs are supported although further pairs are beig planning if and when time permits. If you are willing to help with a particular pair, you are welcome to contact the developer.
